attributes.action: Puppy farms to be made illegal in the whole of the UK and current puppy farms to be closed down.
attributes.additional_details:
Puppy farms are a type of animal cruelty and should be stopped.

Every single one in the UK should be closed down and never re opened. It should be made illegal to keep puppies in dirty, dark, smelly pens with minimal food and water. Enough food and water to keep them alive, just, but not enough food and water to keep their bodies healthy and their organs functioning properly. They sit, sleep and walk around in their own faeces and urine spreading bacteria to other puppies and are prone to bone cancers, arthritis, hip dysplasia and general health problems.
They don't see day light, run or play. They suffer from day 1.

THEY ARE LIVING CREATURES.

We need to stop the parents of the puppies having their bodies abused, litter after litter after litter until their womb is destroyed and they cannot physically cope any more. They are then euthanised or dumped in local fields to die.

Stop this cruelty, stop puppy farms.
